data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Millwall get the game underway.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Preston with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Patrick Bauer with Paul Huntington. This is the first substitution made today by Alex Neil.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Kenneth Zohore.
In the minute 55, Josh Harrop is replacing Brad Potts for the home team.
Alex Neil is making the team's third substitution at Deepdale with Tom Barkhuizen replacing Ryan Ledson.
Preston's Daniel Johnson has been booked in Preston.
In the minute 72, Gary Rowett (Millwall) is making a first substitution, with Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson replacing Mason Bennett.
Tom Bradshaw is on a sub for Kenneth Zohore for Millwall.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Millwall.
In the minute 84, Millwall are going well in Preston. They now lead 0-2 thanks to a Jed Wallace penalty.
Darren Bond blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Alan Browne is booked for the home team.
Shane Ferguson is replacing Jed Wallace for Millwall at Deepdale.
